lyrics:
8 contributorscall me irresponsible lyricscall me irresponsible

do my foolish alibis bore you

call me irresponsible

that im irresponsibly mad for you

do my foolish alibis bore you
well im not too clever
i just adore you

call me unpredictable

rainbows im inclined to pursue

yes im unreliable
but its undeniably true
